  • Constructor Details

    • KumoSFFReader

      public KumoSFFReader(String filename) throws IOException, SFFDecodeException
      Open SFF and cache some basic information
      Parameters:
      filename - SFF filename to open
      Throws:
      IOException - when IO Error occured
      SFFDecodeException - when SFF was bad
      EOFException - when SFF is shorter than expected

    • KumoSFFReader

      public KumoSFFReader(File target) throws IOException, SFFDecodeException
      KumoSFFReader() but accepts java.io.File for SFF file pointer.
      Throws:
      IOException
      SFFDecodeException

  • Method Details

    • GetSFFVersion

      public int GetSFFVersion()
      Returns reading sff file format version.
      Returns:
      1: sffv1 2: sffv2

    • closeSFF

      public void closeSFF()
      Closes SFF. After closing sff, you can not run functions that throws IOException because big data (like actual image data) is not stored in your memory.

    • GetImageCount

      public int GetImageCount()
      Returns image count contained in the sff.
      Returns:
      total image count in sff

    • GetGroupNumber

      public int GetGroupNumber(int imgid)
      Returns Group Number of image at specified index
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      Group Number of image
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • GetImageNumber

      public int GetImageNumber(int imgid)
      Returns Image Number of image at specified index
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      Image number of image
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • GetCoordinate

      public Point GetCoordinate(int imgid)
      Returns coordinate of image at specified index
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      specified center coordinate of image
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • GetX

      public int GetX(int imgid)
      Returns x coordinate of image at specified index
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      specified X center coordinate of image
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • GetY

      public int GetY(int imgid)
      Returns y coordinate of image at specified index
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      specified Y center coordinate of image
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • GetLinkState

      public int GetLinkState(int imgid)
      Returns link id of image at specified index. Returns -1 if the image is not linked one.
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      if image is linked, destination image index. or -1 if not linked.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • IsSharedPalette

      public boolean IsSharedPalette(int imgid)
      SFFv1 only. Returns image mode of image at specified index.
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      Shared palette or not. False if sffv2
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • SFFv2GetImageType

      public int SFFv2GetImageType(int imgid)
      SFFv2 only. Returns image data type of image at specified index. 0: RAW, 1: INVALID(Linked) , 2: RLE8, 3: RLE5, 4: LZ5 10: PNG8 11: PNG24 12:PNG32 -1: no param (SFFv1, always 256 indexed colour pcx)
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      Image type Id, -1 if reading sffv1 (always pcx data type)
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • SFFv2GetImageColorDepth

      public int SFFv2GetImageColorDepth(int imgid)
      SFFv2 only. Returns colour depth of image at specified index.
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      Image colour depth, -1 if reading SFFv1 (Parameter added in sffv2).
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • SFFv2GetImagePaletteIndex

      public int SFFv2GetImagePaletteIndex(int imgid)
      SFFv2 only. Returns palette index of image at specified index.
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      Palette index, -1 if reading SFFv1 (Parameter added in sffv2).
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • SFFv2GetImageSize

      public Dimension SFFv2GetImageSize(int imgid)
      SFFv2 only Returns size of image at specified index
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      dimension of image, null if reading SFFv1 (Parameter added in sffv2).
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • SFFv2GetImageWidth

      public int SFFv2GetImageWidth(int imgid)
      SFFv2 only. Returns image width of image at specified index
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      width of image, -1 if reading SFFv1 (Parameter added in sffv2).
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • SFFv2GetImageHeight

      public int SFFv2GetImageHeight(int imgid)
      SFFv2 only Returns image height of image at specified index
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      height of image, -1 if reading SFFv1 (Parameter added in sffv2).
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • GetRawImage

      public byte[] GetRawImage(int imgid) throws IOException
      Returns raw image data at specified index.
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      Raw image bytearray. Maybe without palette data if shared palette.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.
      IOException - when IO Error occured.
      EOFException - when SFF is shorter than excepted.

    • GetPalette

      public int[] GetPalette(int imgid) throws IOException
      SFFv1 only. Returns palette data of image at specified index
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles. null if SFFv2.
      Returns:
      256 color palette int[], ARGB8888.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.
      IOException - when IO Error occured.

    • ConvertImage

      public BufferedImage ConvertImage(int imgid) throws IOException, SFFDecodeException
      Get image data of specified index then convert it to BufferedImage
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      BufferedImage, formatted in TYPE_INT_ARGB32.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.
      IOException - when IO Error occured.
      EOFException - when image data is shorter than excepted.
      SFFDecodeException - when image format was bad.

    • ConvertImage

      public BufferedImage ConvertImage(int imgid, int[] pal) throws IOException, SFFDecodeException
      Get image data of specified index then convert it to BufferedImage using specified palette data. Only for images that has colordepth is 8 or less. Otherwise pal[] will not be used.
      Parameters:
      imgid - Image index in order of sff subfiles.
      pal - [] palette data, ARGB8888 array.
      Returns:
      BufferedImage, formatted in TYPE_INT_ARGB32.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.
      IOException - when IO Error occured.
      EOFException - when image data is shorter than excepted.
      SFFDecodeException - when image format was bad.

    • SFFv2GetPaletteLinkState

      public int SFFv2GetPaletteLinkState(int palid)
      SFFv2 only. Returns link id of palette at specified index. Returns -1 if the palette is not linked one, or reading sffv1.
      Parameters:
      palid - Palette index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      if image is linked, destination image index. or -1 if not linked or sffv1.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • SFFv2GetPaletteSize

      public int SFFv2GetPaletteSize(int palid)
      SFFv2 only. Returns color count of palette at specified index. Returns -1 if reading sffv1.
      Parameters:
      palid - Palette index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      Palette colour count, or -1 if reading sffv1
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when imgid is greater than image count.

    • SFFv2GetPaletteCount

      public int SFFv2GetPaletteCount()
      SFFv2 only. Returns total palette count. Returns 0 if reading sffv1.
      Returns:
      Palette count, or 0 if reading sffv1

    • SFFv2GetPalette

      public int[] SFFv2GetPalette(int palid) throws IOException
      SFFv2 only. Get palette data of specified index then convert it ARGB8888 int[]
      Parameters:
      palid - Palette index in order of sff subfiles.
      Returns:
      Palette data, int[], in order of colour index, each element is ARGB8888
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when palid is greater than palette count.
      IOException - when IO Error occured.
      EOFException - when image data is shorter than excepted.

    • FindIndexByNumbers

      public int FindIndexByNumbers(int grp, int ino)
      Find image index by group number and image number Returns -1 when not found. if not -1, it is image index that has specified group number and image number
      Parameters:
      grp - Group Number
      ino - Image number
      Returns:
      image index that has specified group and image numbers, -1 if not found

    • ListIndexesByGroupNo

      public int[] ListIndexesByGroupNo(int grp)
      Find image indexes by group number.
      Parameters:
      grp - Group Number
      Returns:
      image index array that has specified group number

    • GetLibVersion

      public static String GetLibVersion()
      Return library version string.
      Returns:
      Version string

    • GetLibInformation

      public static String GetLibInformation()
      Returns library information string
      Returns:
      Library information string
